definition: (of a city etc) ablaze with lights

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Far below the plane we could see the lights of London.
sentences.chinese: 從飛機上俯視遠處可以看到倫敦的萬家燈火。

sentences.english: Do you remember all the city lights on the water.
sentences.chinese: 你還記得萬家燈火映照在水上的景象嗎？

sentences.english: Light across lamps and candles of a myriad families lonely, desolate nobody heard the story.
sentences.chinese: 萬家燈火照亮了隔岸的寂寞，荒蕪的故事無人聽說。

sentences.english: When I was young I love to see in the night lamps and candles of a myriad families.
sentences.chinese: 小時候的我最喜歡看夜幕中的萬家燈火。

definition: to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
not a sound to be heard (idiom)
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
